SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package datamodel

Class Order

Object
datamodel.Order
public class Order extends Object
Class of entity type Order.

Order defines a relationship between a Customer and the seller over items to purchase.

Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-F12-Refactoring"
Author:
"sgraupner"

      Constructor with customer owning the order.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Id getter.
      Returns:
      order id, returns null, if id is unassigned

    • setId

      public Order setId(String id)
      Id setter. Id can only be set once with valid id, id is immutable after assignment.
      Parameters:
      id - only a valid id (not null or "") sets the id attribute on first invocation
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id argument is invalid (id==null or id=="")

    • getCustomer

      public Customer getCustomer()
      Customer getter.
      Returns:
      owning customer, cannot be null.

    • getCreationDate

      public long getCreationDate()
      CreationDate getter, returns the time/date when the order was created.
      Returns:
      time/date when order was created as long in ms since 01/01/1970

    • setCreationDate

      public Order setCreationDate(long datetime)
      CreationDate setter for date/time in a valid range of 01/01/2020, 00:00:00 <= datetime <= today +1 day, 23:59:59. Attemting to set createDate older than the lower bound 01/01/2020, 00:00:00 or past the upper bound today +1 day, 23:59:59 will raise an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      datetime - time/date when order was created (in milliseconds since 01/01/1970)
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if datetime is outside the valid range 01/01/2020, 00:00:00 <= datetime <= today +1 day, 23:59:59

    • itemsCount

      public int itemsCount()
      Number of items that are part of the order.
      Returns:
      number of items ordered

    • getItems

      public Iterable<OrderItem> getItems()
      Ordered items getter.
      Returns:
      immutable collection of ordered items

    • addItem

      public Order addItem(Article article, int units)
      Create new item and add to order.
      Parameters:
      article - ordered article
      units - units ordered
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if article is null or units not a positive units > 0 number

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(int i)
      Delete i-th item from order, i >= 0 && i < items.size(), otherwise method has no effect
      Parameters:
      i - index of item to delete, only a valid index deletes item otherwise method has no effect

    • deleteAllItems

      public void deleteAllItems()
      Delete all ordered items.
